summary: Beyblade team management app with profile pictures and battle scheduling
architectural_notes: Battle scheduling requires leader-to-leader communication/negotiation flow
Profile picture storage and display integration needed

existing_features.title: Display the user's profile picture on the profile page if one exists
Add frontend UI on team detail page for team leaders to initiate battle requests with other teams, including a date picker for proposing a battle date
Add frontend UI for team leaders to view and respond to incoming battle requests with accept/reject actions
Display list of scheduled battles (accepted battle requests) on team detail pages showing opponent team and agreed date

new_feature_requests.summary: Display profile picture on profile page
Team leader can request beybattle with another team
Battle date agreement system between two team leaders
Add backend data model for battle requests between teams, including the requesting team, target team, proposed date, and status (pending/accepted/rejected)
Implement backend endpoint for team leaders to create a battle request with another team, specifying a proposed date
Implement backend endpoints for the receiving team leader to accept or reject battle requests
